description:
Corey is one of four Pok√©mon Trainers who managed to brave Mewtwo`s storm to get to New Island by riding his Pidgeot.
Corey battled Mewtwo`s clone Venusaur using his own Venusaur called Bruteroot. The battle ended quickly after Mewtwo`s Venusaur used Vine Whip to deflect Bruteroot`s Razor Leaf and then used its Vine Whip to throw Bruteroot.
name: Sorao
